name: BadCropper
description:
Survive and escape the badlands before the elements end you.

A journey in accepting loss and embracing new opportunities.

Controls:

LEFT/RIGHT - Movement

UP/DOWN - Increase/decrease text speed

SPACE - Interact

1/2/3 - Select seeds

Made in 5 days for Brackeys Game Jam 2023.1 - Theme "AN END is a new BEGINNING"

DESIGN AND CODE

Joseph Norris/CoSeph Games

ART
